register.name: DWORD1
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 1st DWORD

field.name: BLK_PRT_VOL_STATUS
field.desc: Write Enable Instruction Required for Writing to Volatile Status Register

field.name: WREnable_INST_Select
field.desc: Write Enable Opcode Select for Writing to Volatile Status Register

field.name: ADDR_BYTES
field.desc: Number of bytes used in addressing flash array read, write and erase

register.name: DWORD2
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 2nd DWORD

register.name: DWORD3
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 3rd DWORD

field.name: 144_FR_NUM_WAIT_STATES
field.desc: (1-4-4) fast read number of wait states (dummy clocks) needed before valid output

field.name: 144_FR_QUAD_NUM_MODE_CLKS
field.desc: Quad Input Address Quad Output (1-4-4) Fast Read Number of Mode Bits

field.name: 114_FR_NUM_WAIT_STATES
field.desc: (1-1-4) fast read number of wait states (dummy clocks)

field.name: 114_FR_NUM_MODE_CLKS
field.desc: (1-1-4) fast read number of Mode Bits

register.name: DWORD4
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 4th DWORD

field.name: 112_FR_NUM_WAIT_STATES
field.desc: (1-1-2) fast read Number of Wait states (dummy clocks) needed before valid output

field.name: 112_FR_NUM_MODE_CLKS
field.desc: (1-1-2) fast read Number of Mode Bits

field.name: 112_FR_NUM_WAIT_STATES
field.desc: (1-2-2) fast read Number of Wait states (dummy clocks)

field.name: 122_FR_NUM_MODE_CLKS
field.desc: (1-2-2) fast read Number of Mode Bits

register.name: DWORD5
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 5th DWORD

register.name: DWORD6
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 6th DWORD

field.name: 222_FR_NUM_WAIT_STATES
field.desc: (2-2-2) fast read Number of Wait states (dummy clocks) needed before valid output

field.name: 222_FR_NUM_MOD_CLKS
field.desc: (2-2-2) fast read Number of Mode Bits

register.name: DWORD7
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 7th DWORD

field.name: 444_FR_NUM_WAIT_STATES
field.desc: (4-4-4) fast read number of wait states (dummy clocks) needed before valid output

field.name: 444_FR_NUM_MOD_CLKS
field.desc: (4-4-4) fast read number of mode bits

register.name: DWORD8
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 8th DWORD

register.name: DWORD9
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 9th DWORD

register.name: DWORD10
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 10th DWORD

field.name: MULTIPLIER
field.desc: Multiplier from typical erase time to maximum erase time

register.name: DWORD11
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 11th DWORD

field.name: MULTIPLIER
field.desc: Multiplier from typical to maximum erase time for page or Byte program

field.name: BYTE_PRG_TYPICAL_TIME_ADTNL
field.desc: Byte Program Typical time, additional byte

register.name: DWORD12
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 12th DWORD

register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 13th DWORD

register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 14th DWORD

field.name: EXIT_DPWDOWN_DELAY
field.desc: Exit Deep Powerdown to next operation delay

register.name: DWORD15
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 15th DWORD

register.name: DWORD16
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 16th DWORD

field.name: VLT_WRENABLE_INST
field.desc: Volatile or Non-Volatile Register and Write Enable Instruction for Status Register 1

field.name: SRESET_RESC_SUPPORT
field.desc: Soft Reset and Rescue Sequence Support

register.name: DWORD17
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 17th DWORD

field.name: 188_FR_NUM_WAIT_STATES
field.desc: (1-8-8) Fast Read Number of Wait states (dummy clocks) needed before valid output

field.name: 188_FR_NUM_MOD_CLKS
field.desc: (1-8-8) Fast Read Number of Mode Clocks

field.desc: (1-1-8) Fast Read Number of Wait states (dummy clocks) needed before valid output

field.name: 118_FR_NUM_MOD_CLKS
field.desc: (1-1-8) Fast Read Number of Mode Clocks

register.name: DWORD18
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 18th DWORD

field.name: DATA_STRB_WAVEFORMS_STR_MODE
field.desc: Data Strobe Waveforms in STR Mode

field.name: 4S4S4S_DATA_STRB_QPI_STR_MODE
field.desc: Data Strobe support for QPI STR mode (4S-4S-4S)

field.name: 4S4D4D_DATA_STRB_QPI_DTR_MODE
field.desc: Data Strobe support for QPI DTR mode (4S-4D-4D)

field.desc: Octal DTR (8D-8D-8D) Command and Command Extension

field.name: 8D8D8D_BYTE_ORDER_MODE
field.desc: Octal DTR (8D-8D-8D) Command and Command Extension

register.name: DWORD19
register.desc: JEDEC Basic Flash Parameter Table: 19th DWORD

field.name: MAX4SMODE_SPEED_WITHOUT_STRB
field.desc: Maximum operation speed of device in 4S-4S-4S mode when not utilizing Data Strobe

field.name: MAX4SMODE_SPEED_WITH_STRB
field.desc: Maximum operation speed of device in 4S-4S-4S mode when utilizing Data Strobe

field.name: MAX4S4D4DMODE_SPEED_WITHOUT_STRB
field.desc: Maximum operation speed of device in 4S-4D-4D mode when not utilizing Data Strobe

field.name: MAX4S4D4DMODE_SPEED_WITH_STRB
field.desc: Maximum operation speed of device in 4S-4D-4D mode when utilizing Data Strobe

field.name: MAX8SMODE_SPEED_WITHOUT_STRB
field.desc: Maximum operation speed of device in 8S-8S-8S mode when not utilizing Data Strobe

field.name: MAX8SMODE_SPEED_WITH_STRB
field.desc: Maximum operation speed of device in 8S-8S-8S mode when utilizing Data Strobe

field.name: MAX8DMODE_SPEED_WITHOUT_STRB
field.desc: Maximum operation speed of device in 8D-8D-8D mode when not utilizing Data Strobe

field.name: MAX8DMODE_SPEED_WITH_STRB
field.desc: Maximum operation speed of device in 8D-8D-8D mode when utilizing Data Strobe
